errors.error_description: Incorrect Python version requirement specifying Python 2.7 which is outdated and incompatible
correction_candidates: Before the installation, please make sure that you are using one of the supported Python versions (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).
Before the installation, please make sure that you are using Python 3.8 or later (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).
Before the installation, please make sure that you are using Python 3.6+ (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).
Before the installation, please make sure that you are using the latest Python version (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).
errors.golden_answer: Before the installation, please make sure that you are using one of the supported Python versions (see [pyproject.toml](https://github.com/JaGeo/LobsterPy/blob/main/pyproject.toml)).

errors.error_description: Incorrect command 'lobsterpy analysis' instead of the correct 'lobsterpy description'
correction_candidates: You can use ``lobsterpy description`` for an automated analysis of COHPs for relevant cation-anion bonds or ``lobsterpy automatic-plot`` to plot the results automatically.
You can use ``lobsterpy analyze`` for an automated analysis of COHPs for relevant cation-anion bonds or ``lobsterpy automatic-plot`` to plot the results automatically.
You can use ``lobsterpy summary`` for an automated analysis of COHPs for relevant cation-anion bonds or ``lobsterpy automatic-plot`` to plot the results automatically.
You can use ``lobsterpy cohp`` for an automated analysis of COHPs for relevant cation-anion bonds or ``lobsterpy automatic-plot`` to plot the results automatically.
errors.golden_answer: You can use ``lobsterpy description`` for an automated analysis of COHPs for relevant cation-anion bonds or ``lobsterpy automatic-plot`` to plot the results automatically.
